FRBRalias.value: The Karnataka Evacuee Interest (Separation) Supplementary Act, 1961

p.shortTitle: The Karnataka Evacuee Interest (Separation) Supplementary Act, 1961

longTitle.p: An Act further to supplement certain provisions of the Evacuee Interest (Separation) Act, 1951, in its application to the State of Karnataka.
WHEREAS it is expedient to supplement certain provisions of the Evacuee Interest (Separation) Act, 1951 (Central Act LXIV of 1951), in its application to the State of

formula.name: EnactingText
formula.p: BE it enacted by the Karnataka State Legislature in the Twelfth Year of the Republic of India as follows:—

content.p: This Act may be called the Karnataka Evacuee Interest (Separation) Supplementary Act, 1961.
It extends to the whole of the State of Karnataka.
It shall be deemed to have come into force on the 15th day of October 1960.

section.heading: Application of Evacuee Interest (Separation) Amendment Act, 1960, to the State of Karnataka.—

content.p: The amendments made to the Evacuee Interest (Separation) Act, 1951 (Central Act LXIV of 1951), by the Evacuee Interest (Separation) Amendment Act, 1960 (Central Act 27 of 1960), shall, in so far as they relate to any matterenumerated in List II of the Seventh Schedule to the Constitution, be as valid in the State of Karnataka as if the provisions contained therein had been enacted by the Legislature of the State.

section.heading: Repeal of Karnataka Ordinance No. 6 of 1960.—

content.p: The Karnataka Evacuee Interest (Separation) Supplementary Ordinance, 1960, is hereby repealed.
